content:
Pagest that link to Missing URLs:
Pages are pointed to from the following Da Vinci Clinical Document Exchange pages respectively.
http://hl7.org/fhir/us/davinci-cdex/2019Jun/StructureDefinition-cdex-communication.html
and
http://hl7.org/fhir/us/davinci-cdex/2019Jun/StructureDefinition-cdex-communicationrequest.html

Missing URLs:
http://hl7.org/fhir/us/davinci-cdex/StructureDefinition/cdex-communication
and
http://hl7.org/fhir/us/davinci-cdex/StructureDefinition/cdex-communicationrequest
@David Johnson Not sure what's being asked for here - are you saying there's an error in the IG content or in the publication machinery?

I'm just saying there's a bad canonical URL on the page. It was reported by a user to webmaster. If you visit one of the links on the top, like http://hl7.org/fhir/us/davinci-cdex/2019Jun/StructureDefinition-cdex-communication.html , you'll see in the center of the screen the "official URL"
That url is a 404 and is what was reported.
So, error in the content in that the official URL is non-valid.
@Grahame Grieve - is there a reason it's not resolving without .html?
